name: Minecraft 2D (ThuyaZ)
description: For those who are fans of minecraft, here is minecraft in 2D. You can play Survival, Creative and peaceful mode with generated structures, mosters and everything. There are 2 skin in the game which are Alex and Steve. All of the textures and every other things are same as actual minecraft except mine is 2D. I will create app for mac next time. For now, i just posted a html game. I will be updating the game. My plans are adding more biomes, more generated structures, versions, new mobs and new blocks.Have Fun! Notice: NO LAG, EASY CONTROLS. IT WILL LOAD FOR A WHILE, only for 5 or 6 secs.
